text: The STP 500 is a Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series race. It is held every spring at Martinsville Speedway, It was first run in 1950 and held in conjunction with the Camping World Truck Series race the previous day. Goody's Powder sponsored the race from 1996 to 2002 and again in 2007 to 2012. The race is first of two races held at the racetrack, with the other one being the First Data 500 in November. The trophy is in the form of a grandfather clocks. == References == Category:1940s establishments in Virginia Category:1949 establishments in the United States Category:NASCAR races Category:Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series races Category:1949 in sports
title: STP 500
